attributes.action: Support British Muslims to promote real Islam and combat terrorism
attributes.additional_details: As a working British Muslim I would like to see the promotion of the true religion of Islam that promotes peace and love and the betterment of society as taught by the Prophet Muhammad SAW and there Inheritors and all Prophets. We are 100% against the people that propagate and teach hate and violance in all its form and create division within our society. They slander the name of Islam and the teachings of many beautiful people who taught us the way to peace and love. These people are the enemies of Britain and Islam. We request the Goverment to support those muslims who are activeley promoting goodness and cohesion of Britain and Islam PLEASE? We are 100% AGAINST the promotion of hate, violance and division.
